Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice with root of handle; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; traces of added red above two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of part of a column or a piece of furniture and a vertical element with dotted circles; below, in handle zone, two lines above top of zigzag pattern.
Curator's comments: 'A829B' is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0786) (phase 2)
